name: Choutetsu Brikin'ger
overview: Ironclad (known in Japan as Chōtetsu Brikinger) is a shoot 'em up video game developed by Saurus for the Neo Geo CD video game console. It was never officially released in North America, but if the game is put on a North American system, the game will be playable in English and display the "Ironclad" title screen.
